name: comment
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: something that you say or write that expresses your opinion

example.eg: I don't want any comments on/about my new haircut, thank you!
example.egtrans: 我不想听到谁对我新剪的头发说三道四，谢谢各位了！

example.eg: He made negative comments to the press.
example.egtrans: 他向报界作了些负面的评论。

example.eg: I suppose his criticism was fair comment (= a reasonable opinion).
example.egtrans: 我认为他的批评合乎情理。

example.eg: She was asked about the pay increase but made no comment (= did not give an opinion).
example.egtrans: 有人问她关于加薪的事，但她未置评论。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: used to say that you do not want to answer someone's question

name: comment
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

example.eg: My mum always comments on what I'm wearing.
example.egtrans: 我妈妈总是对我的穿着指指点点。

example.eg: He commented that the two essays were rather similar.
example.egtrans: 他评论说两篇文章颇为相似。

example.eg: The official refused to/declined to comment on the matter.
example.egtrans: 那位官员拒绝对此事发表意见。
